mapper.insert: INSERT INTO facilityreview(rno, culturefno, memberno, reviewcomment, rdate) VALUES(facilityreview_seq.nextval, #{culturefno}, #{memberno}, #{reviewcomment}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT rno, culturefno, memberno, reviewcomment,rdate FROM facilityreview ORDER BY rno DESC
SELECT rno, culturefno, memberno, reviewcomment, rdate FROM facilityreview WHERE culturefno=#{culturefno} ORDER BY rno DESC
SELECT m.id, r.rno, r.culturefno, r.memberno, r.reviewcomment, r.rdate FROM member m, facilityreview r WHERE (m.memberno = r.memberno) AND r.culturefno=#{culturefno} ORDER BY r.rno DESC

SELECT id, rno, culturefno, memberno, reviewcomment, rdate, r FROM ( SELECT id, rno, culturefno,memberno, reviewcomment,rdate,rownum as r FROM ( SELECT m.id, p.rno, p.culturefno, p.memberno, p.reviewcomment,p.rdate FROM member m, facilityreview p WHERE (m.memberno = p.memberno) AND p.culturefno=#{culturefno} ORDER BY p.rno DESC ) ) WHERE r <= 500
